AboutPage.title: The future of translation
AboutPage.subtitle: Synoptic was born from a simple realization: the world is getting closer, but our books are still monolingual. We built the first cloud-native studio dedicated to the art (and science) of bilingual publishing.
AboutPage.sovereignDesc: Most AI tools claim your data. We claim nothing. Your manuscript does not feed a global brain. It stays in your private vault.
AboutPage.soulDesc: We use a stateless architecture (NextResponse). Once the translation is returned, the inference agent is terminated. Memory buffers are wiped instantly.
AboutPage.privacyDesc: Your manuscripts are your property. We use secure, siloed infrastructure to ensure your intellectual property never leaves your control.
AboutPage.perfDesc: Built for the modern web. Every interaction in Synoptic is designed for speed, from real-time cloud sync to professional 300 DPI PDF exports.
AboutPage.communityDesc: We are constantly evolving based on feedback from our community of authors, polyglots, and educators.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy @ Synoptic
PrivacyPage.subtitle: We understand that your manuscripts are your soul. Our privacy policy is designed with a single goal: protecting your intellectual property.
PrivacyPage.philosophyDesc: Synoptic was built on the principle of 'Sovereign Knowledge.' We believe your manuscripts are private property. We only collect what is strictly necessary.
PrivacyPage.collectDesc: We collect account data (email, name) for login, project metadata (titles, structure), and user content (text files) solely for processing.
collectItems: Account Data: Name and email for billing.
Project Metadata: To maintain library state.
PrivacyPage.aiProcessingDesc: We differ from standard AI tools. Your manuscripts are NOT used to train our global AI models. We use specialized, siloed agents that are terminated immediately after the task.
PrivacyPage.securityDesc: All data is encrypted in transit (TLS/SSL) and at rest. You may delete a project at any time to permanently remove it from our servers.
PrivacyPage.sharingDesc: We do not sell your data. We share only with essential providers like Stripe (Billing) and AWS/DigitalOcean (Infrastructure).
PrivacyPage.contactDesc: For privacy concerns, contact us at privacy@getsynoptic.com

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.subtitle: Clear rules. You own your work. We own the tool.
TermsPage.introDesc: Welcome to Synoptic. By using our cloud studio and bilingual typesetting engine, you agree to these Terms. Last updated: December 2025.
TermsPage.ipDesc: We differentiate clearly between the Tool and the Creation.
ipItems: Your Sovereignty: You retain 100% ownership of your manuscripts, translations, and exports.
Our Technology: The interface, Typesetting Engine v4.0, and code are the property of Synoptic.
TermsPage.obligationsDesc: You agree strictly not to reverse engineer our engine or use automated scripts to scrape our library.
TermsPage.paymentDesc: Plans are billed monthly. AI Units are consumed per 'intellectual operation' (e.g., 1 paragraph translation = 1 Unit). Unused units do not roll over unless explicitly stated.
TermsPage.publishingDesc: While our features are optimized for KDP, we do not guarantee acceptance by third-party platforms. You are responsible for the final proof review.
TermsPage.terminationDesc: We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate our Fair Use policy or engage in abusive behavior.

immersion.title: The Science of Side-by-Side
immersion.p1: Reading in your target language is the most effective way to acquire vocabulary naturally. But jumping into a foreign book can be overwhelming.
immersion.p2: Synoptic eliminates that barrier. By providing a perfect, sentence-aligned translation right next to your text, we allow your brain to focus on the story while effortlessly mapping new words and structures.
